file.name: channel.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Adzerk Management API - Channels
  description: Advertiser related Adzerk Management API
  version: '1.0'
servers:
  - url: 'https://api.adzerk.net'
tags:
  - name: channel
    description: Manage Channels
paths:
  /v1/channel:
    post:
      tags:
        - channel
      operationId: create
      security:
        - ApiKeyAuth: []
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              required:
                - Title
                - AdTypes
                - Engine
              properties:
                Title:
                  type: string
                AdTypes:
                  type: array
                  items:
                    type: integer
                    format: int32
                Engine:
                  type: integer
                  format: int32
                  default: 0
                CPM:
                  type: number
                  format: float
                  nullable: true
                IsDeleted:
                  type: boolean
                  default: false
      responses:
        200:
          description: The newly created channel
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: './schemas/channel.yaml#/schemas/Channel'
    get:
      tags:
        - channel
      operationId: list
      security:
        - ApiKeyAuth: []
      parameters:
        - name: pageSize
          in: query
          description: The size of the page to be returned
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int32
            nullable: true
            default: 500
        - name: page
          in: query
          description: The page number to be returned
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int32
            nullable: true
      responses:
        200:
          description: A paged list of Channels
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: './schemas/channel.yaml#/schemas/ChannelList'

  '/v1/channel/{id}':
    parameters:
      - name: id
        description: The Channel Id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: int32
    put:
      tags:
        - channel
      operationId: update
      security:
        - ApiKeyAuth: []
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              required:
                - Id
                - Title
                - AdTypes
                - Engine
              properties:
                Id:
                  type: integer
                  format: int32
                Title:
                  type: string
                AdTypes:
                  type: array
                  items:
                    type: integer
                    format: int32
                Engine:
                  type: integer
                  format: int32
                  default: 0
      responses:
        200:
          description: The updated Channel
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: './schemas/channel.yaml#/schemas/Channel'
    get:
      tags:
        - channel
      operationId: get
      security:
        - ApiKeyAuth: []
      responses:
        200:
          description: The Channel
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: './schemas/channel.yaml#/schemas/Channel'
  '/v1/channel/{id}/priorities':
    get:
      tags:
        - channel
      operationId: getPriorities
      security:
        - ApiKeyAuth: []
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: The Channel Id to get Priorities for
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int32
      responses:
        200:
          description: A list of Priorities
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: './schemas/priority.yaml#/schemas/Priority'
  '/v1/channel/{id}/delete':
    get:
      tags:
        - channel
      operationId: delete
      security:
        - ApiKeyAuth: []
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: The Channel Id to delete
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int32
      responses:
        200:
          description: Successfully Deleted
components:
  securitySchemes:
    $ref: './components/security-schemes.yaml#/components/securitySchemes'

Error:
unmarshal: yaml: unmarshal errors:
  yaml: line 190: cannot unmarshal !!str `./compo...` into ogen.SecurityScheme
